item.title: About
item.description:
Iâ€™m currently working in product development and data analysis, with a strong interest in both data science and cybersecurity. I enjoy turning real-world problems into streamlined digital solutions and uncovering patterns in data to drive better decisions.

I hold a degree in Mathematics from Universiti Brunei Darussalam, where my final year research focused on the spatio-temporal analysis of advertised house prices in Brunei, using R for modeling and visualization. This project sparked my ongoing passion for data storytelling and practical analytical tools.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to reach out via Email or LinkedIn.
